channel.title: Jeollabuk-do on Every Corner of Korea

item.title: You're perfect except for the expensive one, your name is blue crab - Gunsan-si, Jeollabuk-do, Korea
item.description:
Rice thief soy sauce crab. Right in season, the eggs are full

You're perfect except for the expensive one, your name is blue crab

Gunsan-si, Jeollabuk-do, Korea

There is a food that reminds me of the proverb, ‘Even if two people die while eating, they do n’t know.’ If you are on a diet, you should never get close to the rice thief crab. The soy sauce crab sauce can taste the sweet and sour blue crab flesh like 'sashi', and the seasoned crab sauce has a spicy and sweet seasoning and vegetables. In this prosperous season, I visited the blue crab in season.

What comes to mind when you say ‘Gunsan’? Seonyudo Island of Gogunsan Islands? Where Jeolla-do's hearty table starts? Let's take a look at the map for a while. Crossing the stem of Geum River in Seocheon, South Chungcheong Province, the land of Jeolla Province begins. Gunsan is at the starting point. After Gunsan, Gimje and Buan to the south, and Iksan and Jeonju to the east. It is a town that has both the West Sea tidal flats and the Honam plains on both sides. A rich land with fresh water, salt water, and even plains. In addition, it bears the stems of the West Sea and the Geum River, which is advantageous for transportation in and out of the Korean Peninsula. The stem of the Geum River, which separates the boundary between Gunsan and Seocheon, digs deep into the West Sea from the outside to Ganggyeong, Chungnam, and carries it in one body with the sea.
This land, which had a natural environment of warmth, was unable to escape the Japanese occupation. The invaders could not know the advantages of Gunsan, which is good for transportation while also providing abundant food in water and water. In the 21st century, it is also the reason why we can make a “modern cultural history trip” just by looking around Gunsan properly. How can heal wounds stuffed with the name 'history'?

A taste tour of seasonal crabs in the West Sea
I looked at the overall atmosphere of Gunsan. Today's trip to Gunsan is a very delicious 'blue crab trip'. That they don't know if one dies while they eat! The slender young lady is the main protagonist of the rice thief, who eats two bowls of rice. However, there are so many stories that Gunsan had to just come to eat, so it's a pity to eat crab crab and stop by the Iseongdang bakery.
Gunsan Blue Crab Shop <Great> Blue Crab Hansang
Where is that? Thanks to its rich environment, Gunsan has many delicacies. From Korea's oldest bakery <Lee Seongdang> to <Bokseongru>, one of the nation's top five champons, to <Gunsan Sashimi House>, which has the rumor that it boasts the largest scale in Asia. Aside from the crab shop, there are plenty of restaurants and bakeries across the country. In addition, powerful restaurants such as <Daega>, <Gyeok Garden>, and <Han Joo-ok>, famous for their crab dishes, are added. Although not as “touristized” as Jeonju in the neighboring neighborhood, Gunsan here is a taste that can not be missed by gourmets.
The outfit begins with a gentle porridge
On the way to meet today's protagonist Crab, I suddenly wonder. Why is it Gunsan? Blue crabs in most parts of the West Sea. But why is the poisonous Gunsan crab crab famous? Let's find out from the beginning of the crab crab.
Soy crab without words
As we know, there are many blue crabs on the west coast. The East Sea is usually snow crab, and the West Sea is blue crab. As the name suggests, crabs are not as hard as shellfish (salt crab), and they are less expensive than snow crabs, so you can enjoy them freely. That doesn't mean the taste is falling, so I think there is more filial piety for fishermen.
Crab crab's double-headed wagon spicy and sweet seasoned crab
However, there were many difficulties in storing blue crabs. Live crabs eat my flesh over time. Now, when the technology has developed, it is only necessary to freeze and store fresh blue crabs with 'rapid freezing', but where would that be? It is in the same context as the development of chopped salt in a hard land located inland inside the stem of Geumgang.
Soy Crab
Fishermen who had to keep blue crabs for a long time thought of salting. Initially, the crab intestines were removed and salted. The purpose was to keep the crab for a long time without damaging it. However, like this salted blue crab, it can be stored for a long time without being damaged, but it is too salty. The blue crab has a light but salty taste.
Seasoned crab crab
“How can I keep the crab crab for a long time while preserving it?”
Seasoned crab crab rice is also honey-flavored
From this worries, soy sauce crabs were born for the whole country. As the crab was pickled in soy sauce, the preservation period was extended, and the harmony between the soy sauce and the crab meat was good. How happy it was to make the first soy sauce crab.
Soy Crab
There are a lot of hands to make soy crab, but it's surprisingly simple. First, fresh crab is essential. The taste of soy crab is determined by the freshness of ‘flower crab’.
Seasoned crab marinated with various vegetables and red pepper powder
Add fresh green crab, green onion, garlic, ginger, etc., and simmer the boiled soy sauce. Pour blue crab until it is completely immersed so that the sauce is evenly seasoned. Then, if you want to learn how much soy sauce is seasoned with crab meat, pour the soy sauce, boil the soy sauce again, cool it and pour it. Soy sauce crab is the process by which it is made.
The hard part of the blue crab legs is cut out for easy eating.
Repeating this three times is called 'Sambeoljang'. Gunsan Blue Crab is famous for its Sambaljang.
One bowl is just hot by rubbing it on the crab.
A bowl of rice fills up with fresh blue crab meat!
Delicious blue crab, where to taste it? <Daega> and <Gyeok Garden>, located on Geumgang-ro, in Amyeon-myeon, Gunsan, are conveniently located next door. You can enjoy not only crab crabs, but also crab crabs and steamed crabs. It's usually good to go around at 9pm, so it's better to go leisurely. Arrive after a little over 8 pm It's the tip of someone who has experienced turning around at the door, so remember.
Blue crab crab with agu steamed on the blue crab paste
And when you taste crab dishes, it is more advantageous if several people find it. This is because you can taste both crab soy sauce and seasoned crab sauce, as well as a variety of crab dishes, such as steamed crab and main dishes such as crab crab. No matter how greedy you are, it is a little difficult to taste crab dishes among travelers and lovers alone. It's the best fall family meal trip. Delicious but far-flung crab crabs are quite expensive.
Sashimi from both blue crab and white meal
The blue crab alum of <Han Joo-ok> is also indispensable. Soy sauce, seasoned blue crab, sashimi, and fish soup are similar when you think of a hoejeongsik. When agu jjim is added to this, the crab crab is set. Boiled fish and grilled Bakdae are also added. Just think of the hearty shape of Namdo Island.
<Han Joo-ok> Soy crab
The Namdang Port Daeha Festival, Hongwon Port Natural Fish Crab Festival, and Anmyeondo White Sand Beach Festival are held from early September to the end of October. How about going on a delicious Gunsan Blue Crab trip with an exciting festival?
Seasoned crab
Travel information

Restaurants near

-Valley Garden: 470 Geumgang-ro, Revised-myeon, Gunsan-si, Jeollabuk-do / 063-453-0608

http://www.crabland.com/

-Price: 466 Geumgang-ro, Ajeong-myeon, Gunsan-si, Jeollabuk-do / 063-453-0831

-Han Ok-ok: 31, Guyeong 2-gil, Gunsan-si, Jeollabuk-do / 063-443-3812

Rooms

-Apple Tree Hotel Gunsan: 17 Gadoan 1-gil, Gunsan-si, Jeollabuk-do / 063-734-1234

-Best Western Gunsan Hotel: 435 Saemangeumbuk-ro, Gunsan-si, Jeollabuk-do / 063-469-1234

http://www.gunsanhotel.co.kr/

-Provence: 9, Gado 2-gil, Gunsan-si, Jeollabuk-do / 063-467-2100

item.title: 'Cherry Blossom Ending' is on the way to Topsa, and Maisan Cherry Blossom Road - Jinan-gun, Jeollabuk-do, Korea
item.description:
Maisan Cherry Blossom Road is filled with spring mood

'Cherry Blossom Ending' is on the way to Topsa, and Maisan Cherry Blossom Road

Jinan-gun, Jeollabuk-do, Korea

I missed the peak of spring flowers, is it just swallowing the sadness? Jinan Mai Mountain is located on a plateau, where cherry blossoms bloom until late. It is a bulwark of cherry blossom viewing. The shading of Maisan reflected in the Top Youngje Reservoir and the rare stone tower of Topsa serve as a “travel insurance” even after flowering. If you take a walk at Jinan Red Ginseng Spa or Baekwoon Village Village, it is a springtime destination regardless of flowers.
When the flowers bloom in Yunjung-ro, Maisan blooms
Spring flowers are in full bloom in April. It is a good time to go to the mountains. There are many cherry blossom paths. It blooms brightly and abundantly with springtime
The Maisan Cherry Blossom Road is about 2.5km from the tomb of Isan to Topsa. Maisan cherry trees are 20-30 years old and are not large or thick. However, the road toward Sansa adds a sense of luck. It shines in harmony with the surrounding nature. The slope to the top temple is gentle, so walk slowly and cherry blossoms
Maisan Cherry Blossom Road is perfect for walking
Top Youngje, decal comani of spring day
From the road leading to the southern parking lot in Maisan, the streets of cherry blossoms make you feel the peak of spring. When you get off the parking lot, move towards the tower. A quiet cherry blossom path opens.
Restaurants are located at the entrance of Maisan Cherry Blossom Road
The first part is a restaurant around the ticket office. There are many foods in Jinan such as fried ginseng or black pork. It is a place to stop by and enjoy entertainment. It is not easy to overlook if you are hungry.
Representative menu of the cherry blossom road entrance Grilled black pork of Jinan
The nature of cherry blossoms in nature grows as they pass through the Golden Temple. It's the last cherry blossom, so there aren't many late spring visitors, but somewhere in the spring. Nevertheless, the pink cherry blossom branches hanging along the roadside are a constant excitement.
Cherry blossoms blooming in front of the Golden Temple
The essence is Top Youngje Reservoir. It makes Maisan cherry blossoms famous regardless of time. Cherry blossoms along the side of the reservoir
Cherry Blossom Road Bench at Top Youngje Reservoir
If it is a late spring flower outing, the reflection of the young Maisan in the Topyeongje Reservoir will soothe the sadness. Ammaibong and the green of the cherry tree that just sprouted cast a soft shadow on the water.
Reflection of young cherry blossom path and Ammaibong of Topyeongje Reservoir
Decalcomani of Mother Nature is a painting and art. It is a view with elasticity. If you sit still on the bank, it is full of spring energy.
The reflection of Maisan on the waterside is a spring day.
Classic boating is also tempting. It is a duck boat going up and down the water. If you are a lover, you are encouraged to enjoy the scenery of spring on the water.
Duck riding adds classic romance
If you hang over the edge of the cherry blossoms, the petals will fly like snowflake on the water, giving you a romantic moment.
Cherry blossoms blend in the reservoir landscape at sunset
Looking for a springtime spa or “signboard”
The stone tower experience area passes as well as a trip to Topyeongje and goes to Topsa Temple. You can stop walking and build a stone tower. If you are with a family member or a lover, you may wish to add a light wish.
Green and pink cherry blossoms harmonize and decorate spring
Cherry blossoms hang over the rustic stone tower. And when the last cherry blossoms disappear, Pagoda Temple is revealed. Top Temple also acts as an 'insurance' for late flower viewing. Maisan is a must-visit destination with a panoramic view of the tower.
Pagoda's towers are mysterious at any time, regardless of season.
As the name suggests, Pagoda is surrounded by huge towers. These are the 80 stone towers built by Gap-ryong Lee. Among them, Cheonji Tower, Moonlight Tower, and Yaksa Tower are famous. In this, it contained the rationale of the microcosm of Yin and Yang. Most of all, it is mysterious that it has not collapsed in the typhoon for over 100 years. Walk in between and climb to the top pair of heaven and earth. From the back of Cheonji Pagoda
Stacking stones at the Stone Tower Experience Center is also a small pleasure.
After visiting Pagoda Temple, you can pass through Eunsu Temple and Emperor Gate to descend to the northern parking lot. It is also recommended to enjoy the mountain hike in person. Starting from the southern parking lot, climb to Gogeumdang, Observatory, and Bongdubong, then descend to Topsa, or from the observation deck to the northern parking lot, the course takes 2 to 2 hours and 30 minutes. It is a road full of fresh green in springtime.
Cheonji Tower from the top of Pagoda Temple and surrounding mountains
After visiting the cherry blossoms of Maisan or going on a mountain hike in spring, you can make a trip to Jinan Red Ginseng Spa. Jinan is famous for ginseng, but red ginseng spa is a famous place to experience its efficacy.
Open-air hot spring at Jinan Red Ginseng Spa
Jinan Red Ginseng Spa is largely divided into Taiji Zone, Therapy Zone, and Aqua Zone. The Taegeuk Zone, which is a massage method with red ginseng foam, is the special treatment for the Taegeuk Bubble Sense Therapy and the Aqua Zone open-air bath while enjoying the view of Maisan Mountain. You can also spend a day in Jinanville, a lodging facility, and travel to Jinan.
Representative spa facility Taegeuk Bubble Sense Therapy <Photo courtesy, Jinan Red Ginseng Spa>
If you plan on staying 1 night, Baekwoonwon Village is also recommended. It is located in Baekwoon-myeon, about 10km south of Mt.
Interesting patterns in Baekwoonwon Village
It is the most 'good sign' village in the country. Mural villages are the mainstream for the village decorating project, but Wonchon Village maintained village signs in 2007. Uniquely shaped signs add to the fun of walking around town. It goes well with the rustic scenery of a rural village.
The spirit of a rural village will make you feel relaxed.
Travel info

Maisan Provincial Park

-Address: 182 Maisannam-ro, Maeryeong-myeon, Jinan-gun, Jeonbuk (South Tourist Information Center, Maisan)

-Inquiries: 063-430-2651 (Mysan Southern Tourist Information Center)

http://maisan.jinan.go.kr/


Mysan Topsa

-Address: 367, Maisannam-ro, Maryeong-myeon, Jinan-gun, Jeonbuk

-Inquiries: 063-433-0012

http://maisan.jinan.go.kr/home/maisan/seeing/tapsa/tapsa_02


Jinan Red Ginseng Spa

-Address: 16-10, Oejeongsan-gil, Jinan-eup, Jinan-gun, Jeonbuk

-Inquiries: 1588-7597

http://www.redginsengspa.co.kr/


Restaurants near

-Chogajeongdam: Black Pig / 213, Maisannam-ro, Maryeong-myeon, Jinan-gun / 063-432-2469

-Samjingak: Chinese cuisine / 1323 Imjin-ro, Baekun-myeon, Jinan-gun / 063-433-4945


Rooms

-Jinan Red Ginseng Spa (Hotel Red Ginsengville): 16-10, Oejeongsan-gil, Jinan-eup, Jinan-gun / 063-433-0396

-Unjangsan Natural Recreation Forest: 77, Recreation Forest Road, Jeongcheon-myeon, Jinan-gun / 063-432-1193
